report_init.c File Reference

Data structures for the report tool. More...

#include "crisp.h"

#include "alt_report.h"
#include <stddef.h>

Detailed Description

Data structures for the report tool.

The global variables for use in all report tools. Each category defined by a report tool must have a list of structs report_var to define the variable names for the list item, the offset from the start of the report structure (passed in to the output functions of the report), and the type of variable we expect to find at that location.
